meanings.definition: Relating to a type of sundial that uses a vertical marker and a horizontal marker to indicate the time.
meanings.sent1: The analemmatic sundial was designed to show the time using specific markers.
meanings.sent2: The analemmatic design of the sundial made it easy to read the time outdoors.
meanings.sent3: The analemmatic sundial tried to compete with modern clocks but had a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to time management was like an analemmatic sundial, precise and structured.
meanings.sent5: The concept of an analemmatic sundial stuck in his mind as a creative time-telling method.

meanings.definition: A sundial that uses a vertical marker and a horizontal marker to indicate the time.
meanings.sent1: The analemmatic in the garden helped us track the hours under the sun.
meanings.sent2: We relied on the analemmatic to tell time accurately during our picnic.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat thought the analemmatic in the yard was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The analemmatic in the park stood still, casting shadows like a time artist.
meanings.sent5: Children gathered around the analemmatic, fascinated by its time-telling magic.
